scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w api" "npm run dev -w web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w web && npm run build -w api
scripts.build:web:nginx: npm run build -w web && node ./scripts/precompress-static.js web/dist
scripts.build:prod:droplet: npm run build:web:nginx && npm run build -w api
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w web && npm run lint -w api
scripts.test: npm run test -w web && npm run test -w api
